sources.title: Winter of Frozen Dreams | Full Crime Drama Movie | Thora Birch
sources.description:
Winter of Frozen Dreams - Barbara Hoffman (Thora Birch) is a brilliant, beautiful college student by day working as a "masseuse" at a local massage parlor by night. In this true-life murder, mystery Barbara finds herself accused of poisoning two of her clients, men who had named her beneficiary in their wills. Police Detective Lulling (Keith Carradine) works diligently in trying to solve this intriguing, complex case and the results are fascinating.
**The film is under non-exclusive license from Artist View Entertainment Inc.  All rights reserved**
2009.  Stars: Thora Birch, Keith Carradine, Brendan Sexton III

metadata.Plot: Barbara Hoffman is a University of Wisconsin science student. She is a part-time employee at a local massage parlor. She is also a killer. Now all Detective Lulling has to do is prove it.
metadata.Writer: Karl Harter, Michael Caughill, Michael Graf
metadata.Actors: Thora Birch, Keith Carradine, Brendan Sexton III
